pyramid.plunder

Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • pyramid.plunder.Drawable
      • pyramid.plunder.GameObject
        • pyramid.plunder.PhysicsObject
          • pyramid.plunder.Player
            • pyramid.plunder.NPC
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bat, Mummy, Snake

    public abstract class NPC
extends Player
    This abstract NPC Class extends Player; the various characteristics for the player are implemented, such as speed, sightDistance, attack, movement, jumps, and rest, move, and attack Images.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NPC(int[] imageKeys)
      In this, the int imageKeys are passed and given to the super; the isPlayer is true.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHealth(int amount)
      Int amount is passed to this addHealth method; the amount of health is added for the player through an if-statement.
      boolean collide(GameObject g)
      In this boolean collide method, the GameObject g is passed down.
      protected void move()
      In this move method, the player is implemented to move and jump across locations.
      protected void switchImage()
      In this switchImage method, the player and multiple enemies are implemented to attack and jump.

    • Method Detail

      • switchImage

        protected void switchImage()
        In this switchImage method, the player and multiple enemies are implemented to attack and jump. The restImages and moveImages are implemented.
        Overrides:
        switchImage in class Player

      • move

        protected void move()
        In this move method, the player is implemented to move and jump across locations.

      • collide

        public boolean collide(GameObject g)
        In this boolean collide method, the GameObject g is passed down. The player is implemented to jump and to attack through enemies and objects.
        Overrides:
        collide in class Player

      • addHealth

        public void addHealth(int amount)
        Int amount is passed to this addHealth method; the amount of health is added for the player through an if-statement.
        Overrides:
        addHealth in class Player
